meanings.definition: To easily accomplish or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She cakewalked through the math test without any difficulty.
meanings.sent2: He cakewalked his way to victory in the chess tournament.
meanings.sent3: The cat cakewalked across the room as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The experienced hiker cakewalked up the mountain trail.
meanings.sent5: The student cakewalked through the presentation with confidence.

meanings.definition: A dance or contest in which a prize is awarded for the best performance.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a cakewalk to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent2: The annual fair featured a lively cakewalk competition.
meanings.sent3: The cakewalk at the party had everyone laughing and having fun.
meanings.sent4: The children's cakewalk was the highlight of the community event.
meanings.sent5: The traditional cakewalk brought the whole neighborhood together.
